mapper.insert: insert into resumes (user_id, education, experience, skills, preferred_location, salary_expectation, is_public, title, tags) values (#{userId}, #{education}, #{experience}, #{skills}, #{preferredLocation}, #{salaryExpectation}, #{isPublic}, #{title}, #{tags})
mapper.select: select id, title from resumes where user_id=#{userId} and deleted_at is null
